values.value: Global Language Message for Trade-in Language (Allow Decommission)

Illumina is pleased to offer the special pricing listed above for |[Type in number of instruments (spelled out), the numerical value, full name of the product and the catalog number. Example: one (1) Certified Pre-Owned MiSeq System (Catalog # SY-410-1101) (“CPO MiSeq”)]| contingent on the Customer meeting all of the conditions listed below. If all of the conditions are not met, the prices above will revert to standard list price and invoiced to Customer accordingly. CONDITIONS OF SALE: Customer agrees to provide to Illumina a purchase order for all products listed in this Quotation before the Expiration Date listed on page 1 of this Quotation. The purchase order must reference this Quotation. Customer agrees to return to Illumina and transfer all right, title, and interest in |[Type in number of instruments (spelled out), the numerical value, full name of the product and serial number. Example: one (1) HiSeq 2500 Sequencing System (Serial Number: HSQ-7001055)]| (herein “Equipment”) within thirty (30) days of installation of the |POPULATE INSTRUMENT NAME|. If mutually agreed upon by both parties, Illumina may decommission the Equipment at the Customer Facility instead of returning the Equipment to Illumina. Decommissioning will result in the Equipment being permanently disabled. • Customer agrees that for any trade in credit to apply, one (1) instrument must be traded in for each |POPULATE INSTRUMENT NAME| purchase. A maximum of one (1) trade-in credit shall be applied for each |POPULATE INSTRUMENT NAME| purchase. • Customer agrees that unless otherwise agreed in writing by Illumina, the Goods listed above will be shipped with title to and risk of loss transferring at the point of destination, freight pre-pay and add. Accordingly, Customer agrees that orders with acceptance criteria will not be eligible for the special pricing listed above. • Customer agrees that if the Equipment is not returned to Illumina, or Illumina is not permitted to decommission the Equipment, within thirty (30) days of the installation of the |POPULATE INSTRUMENT NAME|, then Illumina will invoice the Customer for the amount of the discount received as a part of this promotion. • Customer shall provide all reasonable assistance to Illumina or its agent with respect physical removal of the Equipment from Customer’s Facility. • Customer agrees that title and risk of loss for the Equipment returned transfers to Illumina upon shipment from Customer’s Facility (not applicable to decommissioning). In the case of decommissioning, the decommissioned instrument remains the property of Customer. • By placing an order in connection with this Quotation, Customer represents and warrants that as of the date of placing such order that (i) it holds title to the Equipment; (ii) the Equipment has not been modified unless the modification was authorized by Illumina; and (iii) the Equipment is free of all biohazards, liens, leasing arrangements and other security interests of every kind. Customer agrees to provide any written documents including but not limited to a Bill of Sale (“BOS”) reasonably requested in connection with the foregoing representations and the transfer of the Equipment to Illumina or its agent. • Customer agrees to reference Illumina’s technology for any publications, public presentations, public announcements, and press releases resulting from the use of products and/or services listed in this Quotation. • Customer agrees that any order placed in connection with this Quotation shall be governed by the Illumina Terms and Conditions of Sale – Goods attached hereto. • This offer may not be combined with any additional discounting.
